name: eruption
flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect_text_simple: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
